collectible.title: Don Patch Sword
collectible.subtitle: Don Patch's purportedly magic sword. Now that you're holding it, you're certain it's just a green onion.
collectible.text: Don Patch carries this ordinary vegetable into battle, and more often than not gets his ass handed to him as a result. It's supposed to be magic or at least a high-quality vegetable, but it's astonishingly mundane. But maybe in the hands of a Legendary Warrior...
collectible.unlock: Lose a game against Don Patch.
